name: ACL Floating Cart for WooCommerce
author: AmaderCode Lab

sections.description:
ACL Floating Cart is an instant cart solution for WooCommerce store with a flying cart, drawer cart, sidebar fixed cart, add an item, update & remove features. Two awesome templates will help you to enhance the WooCommerce cart into floating or Drawer flavor.

= ACL Floating Cart for WooCommerce Plugin Free Version Features=
ðŸ‘‰Instant Floating/Drawer Cart.
ðŸ‘‰Flying product to cart after adding to cart operation.
ðŸ‘‰Built-in two different templates.
ðŸ‘‰Floating cart template.
ðŸ‘‰WooCommerce Drawer cart template.
ðŸ‘‰Ajax-based cart item add.
ðŸ‘‰Ajax-based cart item remove.
ðŸ‘‰Ajax-based cart item update.
ðŸ‘‰Custom cart icons options.
ðŸ‘‰Language configuration for major cart labels.
ðŸ‘‰Translation option for backend & front, MO/Port files are included.
ðŸ‘‰100% mobile-friendly.
ðŸ‘‰Custom CSS support to adjust own design and branding.

= Two Awesome Cart Templates=

Support, Bug Fix, Feature Request

  • You are always welcome for your feedback and new feature requests for this ACL Floating Cart for WooCommerce Plugin! *
    Don’t worry to contact us for any problem or need help with ACL Floating Cart for WooCommerce Plugin through WordPress support center or Help & Info page in the plugin backend panel.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin acl-floating-cart.zip file. Extract and upload in your wp-content/plugins folder.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress by clicking the ‘Activate’ button below ‘ACL Floating Cart for WooCommerce’.
  3. Use the ACL Floating Cart->Settings screen to configure your cart options.
  4. You are done.
